content: forecast hat is constructed by first knitting the ribbing then adding a latvian braid the rest of the color-work is knitted from a chart the ribbing is knit with size 1 needles then the rest of the hat is knitted with size 3 needles yarn needed knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn black mc 80 yds mist 15 yds ash 36 yds sky 36 yds sagebrush 41 yds hollyberry 10 yds this hat fits heads that are 22-24 inches around
